column1: Cafe Ba-Ba-Reeba!////And one more note about booze:  I nearly made the egregious error of asking "where's your margarita list"?  In Ohio
column2: we don't so much know the difference in cuisine between different Spanish-speaking nations.   SOOO
column3: don't come here for a marg--you'll probably get tequila and sour mix with a dirty look.
